description:
Disclaimer: I wrote this app.
I think it's pretty good; however, there is one bug that needs to be fixed. If you join a server with lots of channels, then it makes the window size big.

Launched it for the first time, logged in, crashed.
Now it won't launch anymore.

Please do not rate the app badly, instead report the bugs to github.com/mak448a/QTCord. Also, try to delete ~/.var/app/io.mak448a.QTCord, and see if that helps out with the crashing issue. Logging out of a device from the official discord account will cause the app to crash.
